subtitles.text: Centuries ago, all races lived in peace under the reign of a human monarch.
At his death, with no heir, peace shattered and the throne stood empty.
His demonic advisor seized power and imposed a tyranny.
The races united against him and the world burned in a devastating war.
A village mage gave his life with a forbidden spell, chaining the demon and casting him into the Void.
Since then, each race walked its own path, believing separation would keep the demon sealed.
